knimeNode.name: Term to string
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts terms to strings and adds a new column containing these strings.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to add a string column to each row containing a term. The column will contain the value of the term converted into a string.

ports.dataIn: An input data table containing term cells.
ports.dataOut: An output table containing the input data with an additional string cell column.
